verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: brought] [ARG1: 8,000 of his rowdy friends] [ARGM-DIR: over] [ARG2: to Mike Braun 's place] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday night] . It was quite a party .
President Donald Trump brought 8,000 of his rowdy friends over to Mike Braun 's place Thursday night . [ARG1: It] [V: was] [ARG2: quite a party] .
